metadata.title: CVE-2022-39956 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (CRS) is affected by a partial rule setbypass for HTTP multipart requests by submitting a payload that uses acharacter encoding scheme via the Content-Type or the deprecatedContent-Transfer-Encoding multipart MIME header fields that will not bedecoded and inspected by the web application firewall engine and the ruleset. The multipart payload will therefore bypass detection. A vulnerablebackend that supports these encoding schemes can potentially be exploited.The legacy CRS versions 3.0.x and 3.1.x are affected, as well as thecurrently supported versions 3.2.1 and 3.3.2. Integrators and users areadvised upgrade to 3.2.2 and 3.3.3 respectively. The mitigation againstthese vulnerabilities depends on the installation of the latest ModSecurityversion (v2.9.6 / v3.0.8).

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
